data.eml:eml: A taxonomic review of the Hydraenidae in South Korea (Coleoptera)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lee, Dae-Hyun, Ahn, Kee-Jeong (2016): A taxonomic review of the Hydraenidae in South Korea (Coleoptera). ZooKeys 634: 57-78, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.634.10640, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.634.10640
